product_name: Altus RM40 / Alex X101 700c Rear Wheel
long_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this replacement road wheel offers durability, performance and control. Features a Shimano Altus RM40 hub, designed for use with an 8- or 9-speed cassette. Wear-indicator line tells you when it's time to replace the wheel. Recommended 10mm rim tape sold separately.
short_description: Just right for the first-time cyclist, this replacement road wheel offers durability, performance and control.
